Biographies

  • Juvenile biography

    Terius Gray is better known by his stage name, Juvenile, and is an American hip-hop rapper from New Orleans, Lousiana.

    8Ball & MJG (formed in 1991) are a American hip-hop duo who rose to prominence in the nineties following their 1993 debut album “Comin’ Out Hard”, hailing from Memphis, Tennessee, U.S.
